scripts.install-cdk8s-core: cd ../../../../cdk8s-core && yarn compile && yarn package:js && mv ./dist/js/cdk8s@0.0.0.jsii.tgz ./../cdk8s/examples/typescript/resolve-cloud-tokens/cdk8s.v0.0.0.jsii.tgz
scripts.deploy: cdk -a 'npx ts-node poc.ts' deploy --require-approval never && cdktf deploy --auto-approve && npm run synth
scripts.destroy: cdk -a 'npx ts-node poc.ts' destroy --require-approval never && cdktf destroy --auto-approve
